title: Biden harnesses Defense Production Act to speed vaccinations and production of protective equipment
content:
1. Biden harnesses Defense Production Act to speed vaccinations and production of protective equipment  The Washington Post
  2. Biden administration to use Defense Production Act for Pfizer supplies, at-home tests and masks  CNN
  3. Washington sends in the troops to help California's virus fight  Los Angeles Times
  4. Biden Team to Use Defense Production Act for Vaccine Manufacturing, Testing  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  5. White House announces plans to use Defense Production Act  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
